mapper.select: select * from ( select * from sales order by slike desc) where rownum <= 10 and shide='n'
select a.*, b.* from sales a left outer join comments b on (a.sno = b.cmainnum) and (b.ctype='sales') where a.sno = #{sNo}
mapper.delete: update sales set shide ='y' where sno=#{sNo}
mapper.insert: insert into sales(sno, mid, scategory, stitle, spurchaseddate,susedays,sreason,scondition,sprice,snetprice) values(s_seq.nextval, #{mId}, #{sCategory}, #{sTitle}, #{sPurchasedDate}, #{sUseDays}, #{sReason}, #{sCondition}, #{sPrice}, #{sNetPrice})
